channel.itunes:subtitle: CollegeView - College Finder & Recruiting Service
channel.itunes:author: Hobsons US
channel.itunes:summary: CollegeView.com's podcast featuring interviews from college professors, admission directors, and many others.
channel.description: CollegeView.com's podcast featuring interviews from college professors, admission directors, and many others.

item.title: Music Composition & Dance at Columbia College Chicago
item.itunes:author: Hobsons US
item.itunes:summary: Keri Walters, Associate Director of the Advising Center at Columbia College Chicago, explains what an education in music composition is all about.
item.itunes:keywords: Keri Walters, Associate Director of the Advising Center at Columbia College Chicago, explains what an education in music composition is all about.

item.title: Answers from Alliant University
item.itunes:author: Hobsons US
item.itunes:summary: In this podcast, we'll hear from a student at Alliant International University, who answers questions about the degree completion program in which she is enrolled.
item.itunes:keywords: In this podcast, we'll hear from a student at Alliant International University, who answers questions about the degree completion program in which she is enrolled.

item.title: Podcasting, Prospective Students, and Sports
item.itunes:author: Hobsons US
item.itunes:summary: In this podcast, we'll hear from Dennis Miller at Mansfield University, who will discuss his ideas about the link between podcasting and prospective students. We'll also hear from Ruben Burnley at Lambuth University who will share his ideas about big sports at small schools.
item.itunes:keywords: In this podcast, we'll hear from Dennis Miller at Mansfield University, who will discuss his ideas about the link between podcasting and prospective students. We'll also hear from Ruben Burnley at Lambuth University who will share his ideas about big sports at small schools.

item.title: A Class on Stephen King and Getting Involved on Campus
item.itunes:author: Hobsons US
item.itunes:summary: Dr. James Farrelly at The University of Dayton shares his thoughts on the works of Stephen King, and Dr. Thomas Huebner at Carson Newman discusses all the ways a student can get involved on campus.
item.itunes:keywords: Dr. James Farrelly at The University of Dayton shares his thoughts on the works of Stephen King, and Dr. Thomas Huebner at Carson Newman discusses all the ways a student can get involved on campus.

item.title: Finding a Major and Finding a Job
item.itunes:author: Hobsons US
item.itunes:summary: Carol Wadsen with Naviance talks counselors and Chris O'Malley at Kendle provides some insight into the finer points of the hiring process.
item.itunes:keywords: Carol Wadsen with Naviance talks counselors and Chris O'Malley at Kendle provides some insight into the finer points of the hiring process.

item.title: Test Prep and the College Application
item.itunes:author: Hobsons US
item.itunes:summary: Brandon Jones of Kaplan Test Prep gets quizzed about standardized testing, while Shane Larson of Minot State proves North Dakota to not be a "minor state" when it comes to getting an education.
item.itunes:keywords: Brandon Jones of Kaplan Test Prep gets quizzed about standardized testing, while Shane Larson of Minot State proves North Dakota to not be a "minor state" when it comes to getting an education.

item.title: Up-and-Coming Programs Offered by Today's Colleges
item.itunes:author: Hobsons US
item.itunes:summary: Julie Stewart-Pollack of Rocky Mountain College of Art and Design knows there is nothing easy about green design and Patti Fedje of Minot State examines the impact of fraud in today's business.
item.itunes:keywords: Julie Stewart-Pollack of Rocky Mountain College of Art and Design knows there is nothing easy about green design and Patti Fedje of Minot State examines the impact of fraud in today's business.
